type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. This entity type is equivalent to: Cage, Tank, Fish Cage, https://agrovoc.fao.org/browse/agrovoc/en/page/c_29786, https://dbpedia.org/describe/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fresource%2FFish_cage&invfp=IFP_OFF&sas=SAME_AS_OFF&distinct=1, https://www.seachoice.org/info-centre/aquaculture/aquaculture-methods/

dissolvedOxygen.description: Property. A water quality parameter of the fish containment.

feedingOperation.description: Property. Feeding Operation (hand-feeding, blower feeding, automatic feeders or demand feeders) may affect tilapia performance. Hand-feeding is recommended in small-scale tilapia farms because it allows the feeder to regulate the amount of feed required, prevent overfeeding and observe fish behaviour and feeding activity. This entity type is equivalent to: feeding methods, fish feeding http://aims.fao.org/aos/agrovoc/c_2922, feeding of animals: https://www.eionet.europa.eu/gemet/en/concept/3151

redoxPotential.description: Property. A water quality parameter of the fish containment.

totalDissolvedSolids.description: Property. A water quality parameter of the fish containment.

videoStream.description: Property. URL/Link to the streaming platfrom of camera installed on the Fish containement.

fishDensity.description: Property. Density is a mass per unit volume of any material (e.g., biomass of fish). Animal density is a measure of the number of organisms that make up a population in a defined area. This entity type is equivalent to: http://www.wurvoc.org/vocabularies/om-1.8/Density, https://agclass.nal.usda.gov/vocabularies/nalt/concept?uri=https%3A//lod.nal.usda.gov/nalt/329985

conductivity.description: Property. A water quality parameter of the fish containment.

pH.description: Property. A water quality parameter of the fish containment.

salinity.description: Property. A water quality parameter of the fish containment.

temperature.description: Property. A water quality parameter of the fish containment.

turbidity.description: Property. A water quality parameter of the fish containment.

fishSpeed.description: Property. Speed is the time rate at which an object is moving along a path. This entity type is equivalent to: https://www.eionet.europa.eu/gemet/en/concept/7994, speed: http://aims.fao.org/aos/agrovoc/c_24248, velocity: http://aims.fao.org/aos/agrovoc/c_24098

fishDirection.description: Property. Fish Direction is a measured angle from a reference point
